Question: Regarding NUST Life Insurance (Nust Life), Can I purchase Bancassurnce policy from my account maintained with NUST Bank?
Ground Truth:
Yes, every customer who attain the age of 18 and have account with NUST Bank can eligible to purchse Bancassurnce policy from his account.
Bancassurance is offiered by following three Insurance Provider companies:
- NUST Life Assurancee Company Ltd
- EFU Life Assurence Company Ltd
- Jubilee Life Insurance Company Ltd.
RAG Prediction: Yes, every customer who attain the age of 18 and have account with NUST Bank can eligible to purchse Bancassurnce policy from his account.

Question: Regarding NUST Mortgage Finance (NMF), Can I obtain financing on my owned property by mortgaging it?
Ground Truth:
Yes, purpose of finance has to be in line with the purpose defined by regulator i.e.
Financing for construction of house on owned residential plot.
Balance Transfer Facility (BTF) against existing financing facility of borrower from other banks/ DFIs.
Renovation of owned House/ Apartment/ Flat/ Residential Unit
Extension/ Expansion/ Improvement of Residential Unit
RAG Prediction:
Yes, purpose of finance has to be in line with the purpose defined by regulator i.e.
Financing for construction of house on owned residential plot.
Balance Transfer Facility (BTF) against existing financing facility of borrower from other banks/ DFIs.
Renovation of owned House/ Apartment/ Flat/ Residential Unit
Extension/ Expansion/ Improvement of Residential Unit

Question: Regarding NUST Flour Mill Finance (NFMF), Is there any minimum age to avail financing in NUST Flour Mill Finance?
Ground Truth:
Age of borrower (in case of sole-proprietorship) must be minimum 20 years, however age not to exceed 65 years at the time of application. This age can be relaxed in case of effective succession planning for business operations.
* This criteria is not applicable , if business concern is a partnership or limited company
RAG Prediction: Age of borrower (in case of sole-proprietorship) must be minimum 20 years, however age not to exceed 65 years at the time of application. This age can be relaxed in case of effective succession planning for business operations.

Question: Regarding NUST Auto Finance (NUST4Car), Can I avail more than one vehicle through Auto loan facility?
Ground Truth:
Yes. Two vehicles can be availed simultaneously from NUST Bank, subject to Debt Burden Limitations
9. Can I avail Auto loan facility, if I am not a Salaried Person/Businessman/
RAG Prediction: Yes. However, minimum 30% equity+(1st Year Insurance+documentation charges) is required as down payment.

Question: Regarding Prime Minister Youth Business & Agriculture Loan Scheme (PMYB &ALS), What is the security requirement for availing PMYB & ALS?
Ground Truth:
Tier 2
i. Clean; personal guarantee of the borrower
ii. 02 Post Dated cheques for installment amount
iii. 01 Post Dated cheque for full loan amount plus mark up as per amortization schedule | Tier 3
i. Mortgage of residential / commercial / industrial property owned by borrower or third party
ii. HPA on vehicle in the name of borrower or immediate family member i.e. parents, spouse, children, brothers or sisters.
iii. Liquid security (lien on deposit, Saving certificates, TDRs etc.)
RAG Prediction:
Tier 2:
- Clean; personal guarantee of the borrower
- 02 Post Dated cheques for installment amount
- 01 Post Dated cheque for full loan amount plus mark-up as per amortization schedule

Tier 3:
- Mortgage of residential/commercial/industrial property owned by borrower or third-party
- HPA on vehicle in the name of borrower or immediate family members (parents, spouses, children, brothers/sisters)

Question: Regarding Profit & Loss Sharing Account (PLS), What are the main features of NUST Profit & Loss Sharing (PLS) Account?
Ground Truth:
Profit Payment | Profit Rate
Offered in LCY (PKR) & FCY (USD, GBP, EUR, JPY & AED) | Semi-Annually | 0.19
Account opening deposit of Rs.100 for LCY, US $500 or equivalent for FCY | PLS Pensioners Account
Debit Card Issuance against LCY account | Profit Payment | Profit Rate
Profit Calculation- Monthly Average Balance | Semi-Annually | 0.1925
Profit Payment Frequency- Semi-Annually
RAG Prediction:
NUST offers Profit & Loss Sharing (PLS) Account in PKR & Foreign Currency (USD, GBP, EUR, JPY & AED). The following are main features of NUST Profit & Loss Sharing Account:
- Profit Payment: Profit payment will be made semi-annually
- Profit Rate: Profit rate is 0.19% per annum
- Profit Calculation: Profit calculation is based on monthly average balance
- Profit Payment Frequency: Profit payment will be made semi-annually
- Account Opening Deposit: Minimum account opening deposit is Rs.100 for LCY and US$500 or equivalent for FCY
- Free Features: Free E-statement & I-Net Banking, Free internal fund transfer within NUST via branch (online), Free Banker’s Cheque issuance, Free SMS alerts on digital transactions
